description:
From our law office in Kansas City, Missouri, the dedicated attorneys at the Denning Law Firm, LLC, provide exceptional advocacy and support to clients across our region who suffered a serious injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence as well as those who experienced a violation of their basic civil rights.

Our lawyers possess extensive legal experience, and we have gained a reputation for our outstanding legal abilities as well as our unwavering commitment at helping our clients obtain the justice they deserve. To date, we have recovered substantial amounts of compensation for our plaintiff clients, which means you can rely on us to fight hard on your behalf to help you make your life whole again.

We are passionate advocates for those we serve, and we prepare each case as if it were to go to trial to offer you the best chance you have of achieving your goals and the positive results you seek. Honored for our professionalism and service, our lawyers have earned consistent recognition from our peers as being among the top lawyers in our region. Perhaps more meaningful, our law firm has also enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To find out more about how we can best assist you with the legal challenges affecting your life and livelihood, you can contact the Denning Law Firm, LLC, to receive a free evaluation of your claim. Our law office also currently offers virtual consultations in an attempt at keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy in these trying times.
